evidence_example.title: Demo showing how to use the TI CC2420 transceiver.
evidence_example.small_descr: This is a basic demo showing the use of the TI CC2420 radio transceiver.
evidence_example.long_descr: This example shows how to use the basic API of the radio driver to transmit and receive data packet. The channel access is based on the Aloha approach: a ready packet is sent without sensing the channel.
